For those of you accustomed to WifiWay and do not wish to have to use the Live CD every time you want to use this wonderful program, here I present version 3.4 already installed on a virtual machine and the "VMware tools" also in place, so you just have to, after installing VMware Workstation 8.0.2 (or newer), download the file, unzip it and open the right file with VMware.

In addition, Firefox is updated to version 10 and with adblock plus.
